header_text: Your partner brings home some very spicy food for dinner. After eating some, your face begins to sweat, and you can feel your heart beating in your chest. These sensations trigger streams of anxious thoughts. You decide to focus on the conversation, and your experience the rest of dinner is enjoyable.

elements.Text: You respond to the spicy food by...

buttons: Continuing to worry about whether you have a medical issue.
Tolerating your heart racing and focusing on the conversation.
